titleStmt.title: Don Carlos Buell, Special Orders, No. 18
CWG11990

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 37th - 76th Regiments Enrolled Militia Primary Source Documents (1861-1866)

body.p:
Head-Quarters Department of the Cumberland Ohio.
Louisville, Ky. Decr 2d 1861
Special Order
No 18 }
"Extract"
V. One company of the troops employed as a Police force in this city will be reported to the State Military Board for assignment to such Regiment in process of organization as they may think proper
By command of Brig Genl Buell
Owen. D.
Asst. Adgt. Genl

J. W. Finnell
Adjt Genl
O D Green
Dec 2nd 1861
